entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 6:52 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -0.9°C
Wind: ENE 41 km/h gust 56 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
